name: Smoking Animals
description:
The Player Directions is controlled with "A" and "D" for left and right respectively.

The Player can spawn a potion that can eliminate animals trespassing on his farm. The potion is spawn by pressing "SPACE-BAR".

You have Three see of difficulty to choose from, Easy, Medium and Difficult.

To everyone this is the firm project leaving my laptop,. I'm seeking feedback and mentorship, as i look to enter into the game dev industry.
